songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
She the best at it
From her sex to her shoe game
Shorty killing it—Cobain
She the best at it
Hands down, ain't no competition
We on a money-making mission

[Verse 1]
Shorty know she cold, she the best at it
She know how to work the pole, she the best at it
When the come to going down, she the best at it
Make a, nigga, wanna, change up, throw my best at it
When it come to counting cash, she the best at it
And know how to move that ass, she the best at it
She all about her hustle, she the best at it
And baby girl dope, she my bad habit

[Pre-Chorus]
Ok, I'm throwing all my money, popping all these bottles
And I'mma be up in this bitch, mayne, 'til sometime tomorrow
Then I'm going to breakfast with ten bad ass models
She get with them in that hotel when they going full throttle

[Hook]
She the best at it
From her sex to her shoe game
Shorty killing it—Cobain
She the best at it
Hands down, ain't no competition
We on a money-making mission

OK, she the best at it, she the best at it
She the best at it, she the best at it

[Verse 2]
I beez in here all day, throwing money all day
Staring at that ass, it make me feel some type of way
Girl, my money long, you ain't gotta work, no
Throwin' ass like that I'mma fuck around and buy you a home
We somewhere out the country, sipping on White Russian
Baby girl like it rough, I smack them cheeks and have 'em gushin'
Yeah, we hot up in this room, going hard up in this room
Ain't no place that I won't lay you down and hit it in this room
Ain't no doubt about it, baby girl the best at it
She got that abracadabra, her sex magic
She got me throwing all my money, popping all these bands
All ass on me like she ain't got no hands

[Hook]
She the best at it
From her sex to her shoe game
Shorty killing it—Cobain
She the best at it
Hands down, ain't no competition
We on a money-making mission

OK, she the best at it, she the best at it
She the best at it, she the best at it
She the best...yeah
She the best...yeah
She the best...yeah
She on a mission...yeah; ain't no competition, yeah

[Hook]
She the best at it
From her sex to her shoe game
Shorty killing it—Cobain
She the best at it
Hands down, ain't no competition
We on a money-making mission

OK, she the best at it, she the best at it
She the best at it, she the best at it

Dinnertime...yeah...
songs.title: Best At It
